name: Turtle Adventure 1987
description:
You are a turtle on an adventure. Conveniently, some kind chap has attached a weapon to your shell for extra protection against the evils of the world. Inconveniently, they put it on BACKWARDS!!!

In order to move, you must be shooting (turtles are slow dude, they need the extra propulsion to get goin). You can also do some rapid fire by clicking with some weapons.

Not a ripoff of binding of isaac

Have fun, GL;HF!!!
